commonFaqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
commonFaqs.answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial for all plans. No credit card required to start.

commonFaqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
commonFaqs.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers for Enterprise plans.

commonFaqs.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
commonFaqs.answer: Absolutely. You can cancel your subscription at any time with no cancellation fees.

commonFaqs.question: Is my data secure?
commonFaqs.answer: Yes, we use enterprise-grade security measures including encryption, regular backups, and SOC 2 compliance.

faqs.question: Can I change my plan at any time?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will be reflected in your next billing cycle.

faqs.question: Do you offer discounts for annual billing?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer 20% discount when you pay annually instead of monthly.

about.pageSubtitle: We're a team of passionate developers and designers who understand the challenges of building SaaS products from scratch. That's why we created this comprehensive starter template to help you skip the boring stuff and focus on what matters most - your unique product features.
storyContent: It all started when our founder, Alex, spent months building the same authentication, payment, and dashboard components for the third time. He realized that every SaaS product needs the same foundational features, yet developers keep rebuilding them from scratch.
That's when the idea for SaaS Starter was born. We wanted to create a comprehensive, production-ready template that would save developers months of work and help them launch their products faster.

Today, we're proud to have helped over 250+ developers and teams launch their SaaS products successfully. Our template has been battle-tested in production and continues to evolve with the latest best practices.
about.valuesSubtitle: The principles that guide everything we do.

values.description: Our mission is to empower developers to build and launch their SaaS products faster than ever before.

values.title: Community First
values.description: We believe in building a strong community of developers who support and learn from each other.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: We constantly innovate and improve our tools to stay ahead of the latest technologies and trends.

values.title: Quality
values.description: We are committed to delivering high-quality, production-ready code that you can trust.

generator.title: Test AI Image Generation in Real Time

generator.promptPlaceholder: e.g. Futuristic city skyline at sunset, cinematic lighting, ultra realistic

generator.safetyNote: Generated content must follow provider policies. Avoid personal data or sensitive topics.

examples.label: Brand hero
examples.prompt: Minimalist SaaS dashboard hero, gradient lighting, holographic charts, premium UI kit, 32-bit render

examples.label: City concept
examples.prompt: Neo-Tokyo street market at blue hour, neon reflections, cinematic depth of field, volumetric fog

examples.label: Portrait
examples.prompt: Portrait of a confident product designer, studio lighting, colorful bokeh background, 85mm lens

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about our SaaS starter template.
faq.stillHaveQuestions: Still have questions? We're here to help!

faqs.question: What is included in the SaaS Starter Template?
faqs.answer: Our template includes a complete Next.js application with authentication, payment processing, dashboard components, landing pages, email templates, and much more. You get everything you need to launch your SaaS product.

faqs.question: Do I need to pay monthly fees?
faqs.answer: No! This is a one-time purchase with lifetime access. You can build unlimited projects with no recurring fees or restrictions.

faqs.question: Can I customize the design and branding?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! The template is fully customizable. You can easily change colors, fonts, layouts, and add your own branding. We include a comprehensive design system to make customization simple.

faqs.question: What payment methods are supported?
faqs.answer: The template comes with Stripe integration out of the box, supporting credit cards, digital wallets, and international payments. You can also integrate other payment providers if needed.

faqs.question: Is the code production-ready?
faqs.answer: Yes! The code follows industry best practices, includes proper error handling, security measures, and is optimized for production deployment. Many customers have successfully launched with this template.

faqs.question: Do you provide support and updates?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide regular updates with new features, bug fixes, and security improvements. Support is available via email and our community Discord server.

faqs.question: Can I use this for client projects?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can use this template for both personal and client projects. The license allows commercial use without restrictions.

faqs.question: What if I need help with setup?
faqs.answer: We provide comprehensive documentation, video tutorials, and setup guides. For Enterprise customers, we also offer 1-on-1 setup calls to get you started quickly.

testimonials.title: Loved by Developers Worldwide
testimonials.description: Join thousands of developers who have successfully launched their SaaS products using our starter template.

testimonials.name: Sarah Chen
testimonials.content: This template saved us months of development time. We launched our SaaS product in just 2 weeks instead of 6 months!

testimonials.name: Marcus Rodriguez
testimonials.content: The code quality is exceptional. Clean, well-documented, and follows all the best practices. Highly recommended!

testimonials.name: Emily Johnson
testimonials.content: As a solo developer, this template gave me everything I needed to compete with larger teams. The components are beautiful!

testimonials.name: David Kim
testimonials.content: The authentication and payment integration worked flawlessly. We were able to start accepting payments on day one.

testimonials.name: Lisa Wang
testimonials.content: The design system is incredibly consistent and the dark mode implementation is perfect. Our users love it!

testimonials.name: Alex Thompson
testimonials.content: Best investment I made this year. The template is constantly updated and the support is fantastic.
